## Overview

**Slice Type:** Feature Enhancement
**Priority:** Medium
**Effort:** 5 hours
**Risk:** Low
**Dependencies:** VS-01 (display)

Enable copying result to clipboard and pasting numbers into calculator.

## User Story

```
As a user
I want to copy results and paste numbers
So that I can efficiently transfer data
```

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Copy button copies current display value
- [ ] Ctrl+C copies value
- [ ] Ctrl+V pastes valid numbers
- [ ] Visual feedback for copy action
- [ ] Invalid paste values are rejected
- [ ] Paste replaces current value

## Technical Requirements

**Clipboard API:**

```javascript
async function copyToClipboard() {
  const value = calculatorState.currentValue || "0";
  try {
    await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);
    showCopyFeedback(); // Visual confirmation
  } catch (err) {
    console.error("Failed to copy:", err);
  }
}

async function pasteFromClipboard() {
  try {
    const text = await navigator.clipboard.readText();
    const parsed = parseFloat(text);
    if (!isNaN(parsed)) {
      calculatorState.currentValue = text.trim();
      updateDisplay();
    }
  } catch (err) {
    console.error("Failed to paste:", err);
  }
}
```

**UI Components:**

- Copy button (or icon)
- Visual feedback (e.g., "Copied!" toast)

## Implementation Checklist

- [ ] Implement copy function using Clipboard API
- [ ] Implement paste function with validation
- [ ] Add copy button to UI
- [ ] Add Ctrl+C keyboard shortcut
- [ ] Add Ctrl+V keyboard shortcut
- [ ] Create visual copy feedback
- [ ] Handle clipboard permission errors
- [ ] Write unit tests
- [ ] Test in different browsers
- [ ] Test clipboard permissions
